rows.label: qst101401_msg0001
rows.name:
...I can't say I'm in the mood for
pleasantries.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0002
rows.name:
We sent a vermin specialist with an
armed escort to check on the Volff,
but they're late coming back. By days.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0003
rows.name:
The critters have attacked villagers
and Nopon traders, so we needed to
look into population control methods.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0004
rows.name:
Two of the three guards we sent along
were Drivers. I didn't expect any issues
when it came to combat, but, well...

rows.label: qst101401_msg0005
rows.name:
We're stretched thin enough as is,
so when two of our Drivers go
missing... Well, you can imagine.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0006
rows.name:
Now the brass don't want to risk losing
even more people if something were
to happen to the rescue party...

rows.label: qst101401_msg0007
rows.name:
Would you really? I hate to ask such
a dangerous job of strangers, but...
Hmm, what's this?

rows.label: qst101401_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh, you've got Blades too!
Well that's a stroke of luck!

rows.label: qst101401_msg0009
rows.name:
Many Volff sightings have been
made near Varnax's Plunge. That's
where the researcher was headed.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0010
rows.name:
It's a big waterfall on the Divine Beast's
lower back.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0011
rows.name:
I hope the four are unharmed...
And best of luck to you.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0101
rows.name:
The Volff research party was
en route to the Varnax's Plunge area.

rows.label: qst101401_msg0102
rows.name:
Here's hoping the four of them
return unharmed...
